name: Cachicka
description:
Short description

Cachicka is an arcade car game made by 4 studients of ENTI UB.

It is a game based on Mario Kart and Revolt where the player will have to compete with the AI to win races and unlock new maps and cars.

Main mechanics

  • 3 game modes: fast race, time trial and tournament.
  • 3 locations with 4 different maps each.
  • 4 cars which are unlocked by winning the torunament.
  • The player has a movement boost to be faster on specific moments.
  • 5 Power-ups and trap boxes.
  • The power-ups are oil, rocket, rocket(x3), bomb and slow motion.

Join our discord server to talk with the developers and to ask them anything.

  • https://discord.gg/JHtUn5

Instalation

  • It is necesary to play with a controller.
